news_header: Nokia's operating profit grew by 38% to EUR 1.1 billion in Q4, with turnover up 10% to nearly EUR 6 billion.
news_original_title: Nokian liikevaihto nousi liki kuuteen miljardiin
news_text: Nokia's comparable operating profit increased by 38% year-on-year in the last quarter, reaching EUR 1.1 billion. The comparable turnover rose by 10% to nearly EUR 6 billion. CEO Pekka Lundmark expressed confidence in the continuation of positive market trends this year. For the current year, Nokia anticipates its comparable operating profit to range between EUR 1.9 billion and EUR 2.4 billion.
